channel.title: New Neutral Classes: The Carrot and The Rabbit (Joke Classes)
channel.description:
> **The Carrot - Neutral Killer** :shield: :crossed_swords: Win Condition: Watch to see the main factions lose. [color=lightblue]**Passives:**[/color] What, I'm just a carrot: You night immune once. Too Tasty: You cannot step up for royalty [color=orange]**Day Abilities:**[/color] Carrot Tracks: Mislead the rabbit into thinking all other players are the carrot, you will appear as not the carrot. [color=darkblue]**Night Abilities:**[/color] Carrot Knife: Stab a player using your pointy end, this will kill them. Mutated Carrot (1 use): Kill 2 players tonight along with one visitor.
> **The Rabbit - Neutral Investigative** :shield: :crossed_swords: Win Condition: Eat the carrot. [color=lightblue]**Passives:**[/color] Rabbital Leap: You jump up in the air and this does absolutely nothing sorry I lied. [color=orange]**Day Abilities:**[/color] Burrow: Hop into your burrow making yourself unable to be visited for the night. [color=darkblue]**Night Abilities:**[/color] Sense of Smell (2 uses): You will get the carrot's name along with 4 other players who are not the carrot. Eat (3 uses): Kill the player if they are the carrot.
[More Cool Shit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/pugs-class-megathread/24509)

item.title: New Neutral Classes: The Carrot and The Rabbit (Joke Classes)
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Just eat him! What could possibly go wrong!

Lily:

He is prob rotten.

Exactly, I’m not into vore either.

@NuclearBurrito I’m kinkshaming

Read full topic

you’re probably an egg for thinking that.

item.title: New Neutral Classes: The Carrot and The Rabbit (Joke Classes)
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
The Carrot - Neutral Killer
Win Condition: Watch to see the main factions lose.
Passives:
What, I’m just a carrot: You night immune once.
Too Tasty: You cannot step up for royalty
Day Abilities:
Carrot Tracks: Mislead the rabbit into thinking all other players are the carrot, you will appear as not the carrot.
Night Abilities:
Carrot Knife: Stab a player using your pointy end, this will kill them.
Mutated Carrot (1 use): Kill 2 players tonight along with one visitor.

The Rabbit - Neutral Investigative
Win Condition: Eat the carrot.
Passives:
Rabbital Leap: You jump up in the air and this does absolutely nothing sorry I lied.
Day Abilities:
Burrow: Hop into your burrow making yourself unable to be visited for the night.
Night Abilities:
Sense of Smell (2 uses): You will get the carrot’s name along with 4 other players who are not the carrot.
Eat (3 uses): Kill the player if they are the carrot.

More Cool Shit

Read full topic
item.source: New Neutral Classes: The Carrot and The Rabbit (Joke Classes)
